about: We are a small Guesthouse located in a monumental building right in the heart of the historic city-centre. All museums, attractions, shops, bars and restaurants are within easy walking distance. We offer you a first-class accommodation, which includes private rooms with en-suite shower and toilet, free toiletries, towels and linnen, free and fast wifi in all areas, flat-screen TV with cable channels, free city-map, fridge with goodies, Nespresso coffee-maker and a selection of free snacks. We have years of experience in hospitality and are eager to make your stay with us a memorable one.
